about_the_game:
Various upgrades such as ship reinforcement, retention effects, and module installation, which are growth elements of the spacecraft.

Adds more fun to the game with easy and simple strategies that anyone can enjoy

○ Star Titans: War of the Galaxy is a SF strategy simulation game that explores and conquers the vast universe.

○ A turn-based strategy simulation game based on a light 4X march (explore, expand, exploit, ecterminate) that combines the webtoon story of Titan heading to space.

○ 4X (eXplore, eXpand, eXploit, and eXterminate) of Exploration, Expansion, Development, and Annihilation.

○ Exploration, Strategy, Growth, Construction, War, and Technology Research.

* Game composition

- Over 100 types of spaceships

- Over 80 types of modules

- 64 types of spaceship exterior parts

- 15 types of diverse backgrounds

- Support for global languages

(Game mode)

- Campaign mode, Classic Mode, Custom Mode

(Star map)

- Hexagonal grid star map that is easy to see at a glance

- Discover (resources, technology, planets, enemy ships, etc.) through exploration

(Research tree)

- Stimulate growth desire by strengthening abilities through development of 5 types of technology

(Ship management)

- Equip ships with weapons/energy/defense modules, etc.

- Ship customization

(Battle)

- Turn-based attack in the form of short-term close combat

- When participating in battle, surrounding units randomly attack the opposing unit

- Battle scene production and simplified production

(Construction)

- Install buildings in my area

- Install special buildings in stars, gaseous planets, comets, and ice asteroids

(Conquer planets)

- Place your allied fleet on an enemy/neutral planet tile to start the conquest

- If the fleet holds its position for 1 turn, the conquest is successful (uses the planet's resources and services)

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit (version 21H1)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 670 (2GB) or AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) or Intel® Arc™ A380 (6GB) or Intel® Iris™ Xe G7 (Tiger Lake) or AMD® Radeon™ Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 12
